q_en: What are the cutting tasks assigned to Precision Cutters?
gt:
Hey there! ğŸ˜„ Let's take a look at the cutting tasks assigned to the "Precision Cutters" working group. Here's what I found:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 18      | March 11, 2024      | April 7, 2024       | 18               | 200            | 200              | Completed âœ… |
| 30      | April 19, 2024      | April 26, 2024      | 30               | 195            | 195              | Completed âœ… |

Looks like the "Precision Cutters" have been busy and completed their tasks successfully! ğŸ‰ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask!

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Precision Cutters';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Precision Cutters"

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, op.id AS order_product_id, op.number AS planned_number, ct.completed_number, ct.status FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.working_group_id = '1';
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks assigned to the working group "Precision Cutters"
